rows.label: qev011301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, great. It's completely broken.
Juuust lovely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Maybe coming this far out on your own was a bad
idea. What do you think, girl? Bad idea? Yeaaaah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0003
rows.name:
And you're out of SOS range, of course. Urrrrgh...
What are you gonna do now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0004
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_JNK0010
rows.name: Offer Help

rows.label: qev011301_SEL0011
rows.name: Offer to lend May a hand.

rows.label: qev011301_JNK0020
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev011301_SEL0021
rows.name: Leave May to keep mumbling to herself.

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0005
rows.name: Oh, swell. Now you're seeing things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0006
rows.name:
Your brain knows it's about to get eaten by monsters,
so it's checked out early.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0008
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Wait, are you real? And a BLADE?
...Seriously?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0010
rows.name:
...Yeah, this isn't getting fixed without new parts.
Or at least some materials to patch up the old parts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0011
rows.name:
And there is NOTHING around here like that,
so instead you're going to sit here and get eaten
by monsters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0012
rows.name: Faaantastic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0013
rows.name:
Might as well jusâ€”AAAAAUUGH!
Holy crap! How long you been standing there?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0014
rows.name: Wait, are you a BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0015
rows.name: Er, sorry, I just... I mean...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0016
rows.name:
Ugh! Apologies. I'm not very good at talking with
people. Let me take a deep breath here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0017
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0018
rows.name:
Okay. Whew. So here's the deal:
I...was attacked by some indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0019
rows.name:
Wrecked my Skell. No spare parts. Pretty much
stranded. ...Aaaaand now you're caught up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_JNK0110
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev011301_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask May where the rest of her team is.

rows.label: qev011301_JNK0120
rows.name: Help

rows.label: qev011301_SEL0121
rows.name: Offer to help May if she needs it.

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Team? Hah! Oh, please. Like anyone would want
to work with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0021
rows.name:
I'm oblivious. I screw up like this all the time.
Did I mention I'm not good at the whole "talking" deal?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Anyway, I decided to try the lone-wolf thing.
Figured I'd see how that worked out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0023
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0024
rows.name: But, uh... Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Not working out so great, is it? Even a lone wolf can't
do much with a busted Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0026
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0027
rows.name:
This is probably one of those inappropriate things to
ask, buuuut...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0028
rows.name:
don't suppose I could get you to gather some stuff
to help me patch up my Skell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0029
rows.name:
I'll pay you and junk. Plus, I should be able to handle
the repairs once I've got the goods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0030
rows.name:
Yeaaah... Asking kind of a lot from a total stranger,
right? Sorry. Look, just...forget it, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0031
rows.name: What? No. Don't waste your time on me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0032
rows.name:
I'm a perpetual screw-up. The whole reason I work
alone is so I won't drag everyone down with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0033
rows.name: Really. I couldn't trouble you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0034
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0035
rows.name:
Though I don't suppose there's any way for me to deal
with a busted Skell by myself...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0036
rows.name:
Look, I'll repay you as best I'm able! Er, not to assume
you'll help. I mean, I could use some spare Skell parts.
...Man, this whole conversation just went backwards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0037
rows.name:
But if I can't get new parts, then just the materials to
patch up the broken parts will do. Once I have those,
I can handle the repairs. So, um...please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0038
rows.name:
Thanks a lot. And not just for the offer of help,
but...for talking to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0039
rows.name:
It's been a long time since I last talked to someone.
I...I kinda missed it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0040
rows.name:
Er, guess I should specify the actual stuff I need...
I need four vials of viscous humour and two globs of
silvery cactaceous resin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0041
rows.name:
And I'm happy to wait, so no rush. Really.
Just...whenever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0042
rows.name:
I'll investigate this general area until you get back.
Hopefully I'll find some rare collectibles...or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0043
rows.name:
Oh, yeah, I'm a Curator. Should have mentioned
that before, I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0044
rows.name:
So really, take your time. I'm good at keeping
myself busy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0045
rows.name:
Whenever you can bring those four vials of viscous
humour and two globs of silvery cactaceous resin
is fine by me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0046
rows.name:
Ah, [ST:playername ]! Huge discovery!
I was walking around the area a little while ago,
and I found some dobobora broccoli![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0047
rows.name: That stuff is SUPER rare![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0048
rows.name:
A lot of Curators strike out looking for it,
and I just stumbled on it at random.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0049
rows.name:
This assignment's still a disaster, but at least now I get
to feel like I'm contributing something to the cause.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_JNK0210
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev011301_SEL0211
rows.name: Encourage May by saying her luck must have changed.

rows.label: qev011301_JNK0220
rows.name: Remind

rows.label: qev011301_SEL0221
rows.name:
Remind May her find is meaningless
as long as her Skell remains busted.

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0050
rows.name: Heh. Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0051
rows.name:
Not that it means much if I can't get this Skell fixed
and haul myself back to New LA in one piece.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0052
rows.name:
Er, right. Sorry. I got excited. Forgot I'm relying on
you for preeeetty much everything right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0053
rows.name: See? This is why I'm no good. Sorry...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0054
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0055
rows.name: So, um...any luck finding those materials?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0056
rows.name:
Wow, these are perfect! I can get to work fixing
my ride now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0057
rows.name:
It's an experimental model. My Skell, I mean.
Just happened to luck into a great deal on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0058
rows.name:
Normally, it'd be way more than someone like me
could afford. Or deserve...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0059
rows.name:
But yeah. Still really glad I can at least start fixing her
up now. So I guess all that's left to do is reward you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0060
rows.name:
Actually, here! I don't have enough money to thank you
properly, but you can have this dobobora broccoli![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0061
rows.name:
No, really, I want you to have it. I only found it by
dumb luck, and I'm sure someone like you can make
better use of it anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0063
rows.name: But yeah, I think I can manage from here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0064
rows.name:
You can finally get back to whatever job of yours
I've been interrupting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0065
rows.name:
I'm really sorry for taking up so much of your time.
Thanks for everything![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_JNK0310
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev011301_SEL0311
rows.name:
Express concern on whether May can
make it back safely on her lonesome.

rows.label: qev011301_JNK0320
rows.name: Support

rows.label: qev011301_SEL0321
rows.name:
Encourage May by telling her
she makes a great lone wolf.

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0066
rows.name:
Oh, I couldn't possibly keep someone like you any
longer than I already have![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0067
rows.name: Besides, I'm used to rolling solo by now. I'll get by.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0068
rows.name: I'm fine. Really. You go on ahead![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0069
rows.name:
I'll make my way around Mira without causing any
further trouble. Promise![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0070
rows.name:
Wow, that's new. I've never really had anyone
say something like that to me before...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0071
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0072
rows.name:
I'll, um... I'll do my best! I mean that. Still probably
won't get as much done as a proper team would,
buuut...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0073
rows.name: I'll do everything I can to contribute to BLADE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0074
rows.name:
Take care now. And if we meet again somewhere,
um...I hope we can maybe talk some more?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011301_MSG0075
rows.name: Until then, I hope all your searches are fruitful![ST:wait ]
